arts.ttl: Empoli vs. Verona, fighting for survival
arts.sum: Empoli have conceded the joint-most goals by substitutes in Serie A this season (14, level with Monza), while Hellas Verona have scored nine of their 32 total goals by subs-on players (28%), a percentage lower only than Lazio (34%). After a 20-game winless streak in Serie A, in which Empoli had picked up just six points (L14), the Tuscan team have now won two in a row and could make it three in the competition for the first time since May 2019, when they won on matchdays 35, 36 and 37.

arts.ttl: Preview: Empoli vs. Hellas Verona - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Sunday's Serie A clash between Empoli and Hellas Verona, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

Empoli secured their second win in a row thanks to a second half comeback in Monza on Sunday, as the Azzurri scored three goals without reply after being 1-0 down at halftime. The Tuscanians will now...
